about:
Hi, I'm Raquel! I'm an illustrator, animator, comic artist, and sometimes a composer. 

This website you are on right now is my portfolio site, which you can navigate between different examples of my work.

I'm an art lover and biology nerd- I majored in Art with a concentration in New Media at George Mason University! That's also where I met my partner, now fiance, while working on a mural project as a mural design lead!
